ygData.msgSnippet: I forgot to add this in my answer. I have 1 SDRAM chip in right now. I have four other slots that are being used by some older mem chips. Tha is why I have
ygData.messageBody:
I forgot to add this in my answer. I have 1 SDRAM chip in right now.
I have four other slots that are being used by some older mem chips.
Tha is why I have 224? MB RAM. I am going to be buying another 128
SDRAM chip in the next few weeks, but I can' afford it right now. (I
think the store charged me $70.00? Maybe less, I can't remember.) I
do know that when I click on my EQ icon and download all the files
and I go to play it says that no 3D device was detected. I thought
that was the vid card so that was why I bought the new one. I don't
understand why my motherboard won't support it as I just bought a vid
card not five months ago when my old one died. (This one was a PCI.
The new one I bought is an AGP.) Thanks. The Raven
